sentences.en: A data structure for mutual exclusion, also known as a binary semaphore.
sentences.cn: 表现互斥现象的数值结构, 也被当作二元信号灯.

sentences.en: A sense of the girls and boys behind me filled me to the exclusion of everything.
sentences.cn: 我脑海里给背后的男女孩子们占满了,而这种感觉把一切都给挤跑了.

sentences.en: A spokeswoman for Mr Prescott yesterday made it clear that he had been unhappy at his exclusion.
sentences.cn: 普雷斯科特先生的发言人昨天表明他对于自己被拒绝十分不满。

sentences.en: An insurance document may contain reference to any exclusion clause.
sentences.cn: 保险单据可以援引任何除外责任条款.

sentences.en: Color analysis is then performed for the exclusion of tree areas.
sentences.cn: 利用空照影像之色彩分析,将地上物区域之树木部分去除.

sentences.en: Diane had dedicated her life to caring for him to the exclusion of all else.
sentences.cn: 黛安娜一生都在照顾他，对其他一切都无暇顾及。

sentences.en: don't revise a few topics to the exclusion of all others.
sentences.cn: 不要为了改几个话题而将所有其他话题排除在外了。

sentences.en: Don't revise a few topics to the exclusion of all others.
sentences.cn: 不要修改少数论题以致排除所有其他的.

sentences.en: First of all, there is the " mode of exclusion "
He plays golf to the exclusion of all other sports.
sentences.cn: 他专打高尔夫球,其他运动一概不参加.

sentences.en: Mutual exclusion is the rule in both discrete and contiguous selection.
sentences.cn: 互斥对离散选择和连续选择都适用.

sentences.en: She studies world history at the university, to the exclusion of all other subjects.
sentences.cn: 她在大学里专攻世界历史, 其他课未修.

sentences.en: The exclusion principle is a statement of this empirical finding.
sentences.cn: 不相容原理是这个实验发现的表述.

sentences.en: The judge placed an exclusion order on him, banning him from city centre shops.
sentences.cn: 法官给他下了禁令，禁止他进入市中心的店铺。

sentences.en: The lower curve marks the exclusion threshold for data pairs.
sentences.cn: 下部曲线标志出对数据对的排除域.

sentences.en: Which the elation of liberty and the pain of exclusion were indistinguishably mingled.
sentences.cn: 她既为自由而洋洋得意,又因未能参加而不胜伤心,两种感情难分难解地纠集在一起.

sentences.en: Your essays tend to concentrate on one theme to the exclusion of everything else.
sentences.cn: 你的文章往往会集中于一个主题而不顾及其他各个方面。

words.tran_cn: 独家新闻；独家经营的项目；排外者
排除；排斥；拒绝接纳；逐出
排除；排斥；驱逐；被排除在外的事物

phrases.tran_cn: 排阻色谱法；筛析色谱法
不相容原理；泡利不相容原理

trans.tran_en: when someone is not allowed to take part in something or enter a place
